text.section:
Upon making its determination under subsection (a) of this section, the Board shall notify the person subject to debarment in writing either that:
the person is debarred and the period of debarment; or
the person is no longer subject to debarment for the act which was the subject of the hearing and determination.
Except as provided in § 16-310 of this subtitle, this section does not apply to a person debarred under § 16-202(a) of this title.
